title: Field narrowed to two in Chicopee's Ward 1 City Council race
content:
CHICOPEE, MA (WGGB/WSHM) - 

Voters in Chicopee's Ward 1 voted today to cut the field from three city council candidates to two.

Incumbent councilor Adam Lamontagne received 457 votes and will face former councilor Dino Brunetti, who picked up 258 votes, in the November election

Newcomer Robert Delano came in third with 45 votes.

Seventeen percent of the ward one's 4,356 voters cast ballots.
